description: This Java source file defines a REST controller named HelloController for a Spring Boot application. It provides basic utility endpoints such as root greeting, documentation redirect, health check, and application info.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing basic endpoints for health check, documentation redirect, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a welcome message indicating the application is running.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects clients to the Swagger UI documentation page, constructing the URL based on the incoming request.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Returns a simple 'OK' string to indicate the application's health status.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Provides basic application information, indicating it is a Spring Boot application called 'todobackend'.
